solution_line_template: Vicente spent {rice_kilograms} x ${price_per_kg_rice} = ${<<{rice_kilograms}*{price_per_kg_rice}={cost_rice}>>}{cost_rice} for {rice_kilograms} kilograms of rice.
He spent {meat_pounds} x ${price_per_pound_meat} = ${<<{meat_pounds}*{price_per_pound_meat}={cost_meat}>>}{cost_meat} for {meat_pounds} pounds of meat.
Therefore, the total amount he spent was ${cost_meat} + ${cost_rice} = ${<<{cost_meat}+{cost_rice}={total_spent}>>}{total_spent}.
